name: early-bird
effect: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
short_effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
flavor_text.platinum: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
